ygData.subject: Re: Spell Resisted
ygData.msgSnippet: Eheheh it is true a resisted spell do same effect as full hit it is beter to be partialy resisted then to be full red resisted. okit it count as try lets say
ygData.messageBody:
Eheheh it is true a resisted spell do same effect as full hit it is beter
to be partialy resisted then to be full red resisted. okit it count as try
lets say 10 20 % of resisted spell but not as full hit ! !




At 11.50 24/06/99 -0500, you wrote:
>From: Keith Wiseman <keithw@...>
>
>Fyi... Mobs WILL come after you even if you are resisted, happens all the
>time to me... It is something that really pisses me off so I make note of
>it every time :)
>
> -----Original Message-----
>From: yur@... [mailto:yur@...]
>Sent: Thursday, June 24, 1999 11:48 AM
>To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
>Subject: [eq_wizards] Spell Resisted
>
>From: yur@...
>
>
>
>its not so bad that our spells are resisted with lvl 6+ higher
>
>I've been in Unrest since lvl 15 and most of my spells are resisted by Dark
>Bones and Dry Bones. But its not so bad as long as your groups are doing
>fine.
>Just join up and sit there to gain Xp and Loot. no danger since u don't hit
>the
>mob, so it won't come after u. Just cast it once at start of fight to see
>if
>its resisted. and then start on the Radiation. I gained a lot Xp and only
>died
>Once from a skeleton monk that killed someone else and then came after me
>from
>behind. if they ask you why you aren't helping, just say ur resisted. or
>just
>cast a few frost shocks to pretend ur helping out :)
>
>
